001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.Hex;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.shared.JavaHelpers;
008
009import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
010import org.json.JSONObject;
011
012import java.util.Set;
013
014public abstract class Message {
015    public static final byte[] EMPTY = new byte[]{};
016    protected byte[] cargo = null;
017
018    public abstract void parse(byte[] raw);
019
020    public MessageProps props() {
021        return getClass().getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
022    }
023
024    public byte opCode() {
025        return props().opCode();
026    }
027
028    public boolean signed() {
029        return props().signed();
030    }
031
032    public boolean stream() {
033        return props().stream();
034    }
035
036    public MessageType type() {
037        return props().type();
038    }
039
040    public Class<? extends Message> getResponseClass() {
041        Validate.isTrue(type() == MessageType.REQUEST);
042        return props().response();
043    }
044
045    public MessageProps getResponseProps() {
046        Validate.isTrue(type() == MessageType.REQUEST);
047        return props().response().getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
048    }
049
050    public byte getResponseOpCode() {
051        if (type() == MessageType.REQUEST) {
052            return getResponseProps().opCode();
053        }
054        return opCode();
055    }
056
057    public int getResponseSize() {
058        if (type() == MessageType.REQUEST) {
059            return getResponseProps().size();
060        }
061        return props().size();
062    }
063
064    public Class<? extends Message> getRequestClass() {
065        Validate.isTrue(type() == MessageType.RESPONSE);
066        return props().request();
067    }
068
069    public MessageProps getRequestProps() {
070        Validate.isTrue(type() == MessageType.RESPONSE);
071        return props().request().getAnnotation(MessageProps.class);
072    }
073
074    public Characteristic getCharacteristic() {
075        return props().characteristic();
076    }
077
078    public byte[] getCargo() {
079        return this.cargo;
080    }
081
082    public void fillWithEmptyCargo() {
083        this.cargo = EMPTY;
084    }
085
086    protected byte[] removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(byte[] raw) {
087        if (signed() && raw.length == props().size() + 24) {
088            return Bytes.dropLastN(raw, 24);
089        }
090        return raw;
091    }
092
093    private static final Set<String> IGNORED_PROPERTY_NAMES = Set.of("requestClass", "requestProps", "historyLogStreamBytes", "intMap");
094
095    public String toString() {
096        return JavaHelpers.autoToString(this, IGNORED_PROPERTY_NAMES);
097    }
098
099    public String verboseToString() {
100        return JavaHelpers.autoToStringVerbose(this, IGNORED_PROPERTY_NAMES);
101    }
102
103    public String messageName() {
104        return getClass().getName().replace("com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.", "");
105    }
106
107    public String jsonToString() {
108        String generatedToString = JavaHelpers.autoToStringJson(this, IGNORED_PROPERTY_NAMES);
109        JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
110        obj.put("name", messageName());
111        obj.put("messageProps", new JSONObject(propsJsonToString()));
112        obj.put("params", new JSONObject(generatedToString));
113        obj.put("cargoHex", Hex.encodeHexString(getCargo()));
114
115        return obj.toString(0);
116    }
117
118    private String propsJsonToString() {
119        JSONObject props = new JSONObject();
120        props.putOpt("opCode", props().opCode());
121        props.putOpt("size", props().size());
122        props.putOpt("variableSize", props().variableSize());
123        props.putOpt("stream", props().stream());
124        props.putOpt("signed", props().signed());
125        props.putOpt("type", props().type());
126        if (!props().response().equals(UndefinedMessage.class)) {
127            props.putOpt("responseName", props().response().getName().replace("com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.", ""));
128            props.putOpt("responseOpCode", props().response().getAnnotation(MessageProps.class).opCode());
129        }
130        if (!props().request().equals(UndefinedMessage.class)) {
131            props.putOpt("requestName", props().request().getName().replace("com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.", ""));
132            props.putOpt("requestOpCode", props().request().getAnnotation(MessageProps.class).opCode());
133        }
134        props.putOpt("minApi", props().minApi());
135        props.putOpt("supportedDevices", props().supportedDevices());
136        props.putOpt("characteristicUuid", props().characteristic().getUuid());
137        props.putOpt("characteristic", props().characteristic().name());
138        props.putOpt("modifiesInsulinDelivery", props().modifiesInsulinDelivery());
139        return props.toString(0);
140    }
141}
